baseRule.text: 若比丘與女人同室宿者波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 4

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 6

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer sich mit einer Frau {in derselben Unterkunft} zusammen niederlegt, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk lies down in the same sleeping place as a woman, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu se recuesta [en la misma morada] con una mujer: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。共女人一房舍宿。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 65

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與女人同房舍宿。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 65

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻共女人同室宿者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 65

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。與女人同室宿。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 56

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。與女人同屋宿。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 69

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！與女人同室宿者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 4

translations.text: If a monk occupy the same lodging as a woman, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu melewati malam dengan tidur di ruangan yang sama dengan seorang wanita, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘與女人同室宿。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 65

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 102

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer sich mit einem Mann {in derselben Unterkunft} zusammen niederlegt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni lie down in the same lodging with a man, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang berbaring di penginapan yang sama dengan seorang pria, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，與男子同室宿者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 4

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼與男子同室宿。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 41

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼與男子同室宿。波夜提(五十)。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 50

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼共男子同室宿者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 50
